verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Praise the Name of your Lord, the Most High.
verse.verse_5: And then turns it into light debris.
verse.verse_6: We will make you read, so do not forget.
verse.verse_7: Except what God wills. He knows what is declared, and what is hidden.
verse.verse_8: We will ease you into the Easy Way.
verse.verse_11: But the wretched will avoid it.
verse.verse_12: He who will enter the Gigantic Fire.
verse.verse_13: Where he will neither die, nor live.
verse.verse_14: Successful is he who purifies himself.
verse.verse_15: And mentions the name of his Lord, and prays.
verse.verse_16: But you prefer the present life.
verse.verse_17: Though the Hereafter is better, and more lasting.
verse.verse_18: This is in the former scriptures.
verse.verse_19: The Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
